reviews.review_msg: Janet is really interested in the area she teaches. Although she might be a little disorganized at certain times, she is always open for questions and any help that a student may require.

This class is taught by Jan & Frederik which makes assignment guidelines confusing. Jan writes the quizzes and she often misspells or confuses her concepts making the quizzes difficult to understand. She asks students for answers and instead of being respectful when she disagrees she just says "no that's wrong" and doesn't listen to their reasoning
Great character who loves transferring knowledge to students. Enjoyed the course, if you like readings and applying theory and being able to transfer that into producing a project def go with him
Fred is truly passionate about what he teaches. He was always open for questions and made the lectures a lot easier to enjoy.
